Feedback

Enterprise
Developer Dashboard
Pro API (Paid plans)
Guides
API Reference
Changelog
Search
CTRL-K
Public Companies Holdings
GET
https://pro-api.coingecko.com/api/v3/companies/public_treasury/{coin_id}

This endpoint allows you query public companies‚Äô Bitcoin or Ethereum holdings

üìò

Notes

The responses are sorted in descending order based on total holdings.
PATH PARAMS
coin_id
string
required

coin ID

bitcoin
ethereum
RESPONSE
200

Get public companies treasury data

RESPONSE BODY
object
total_holdings
number

total btc/eth holdings of companies

total_value_usd
number

total btc/eth holdings value in usd

market_cap_dominance
number

market cap dominance

companies
array of objects
object
name
string

company name

symbol
string

company symbol

country
string

company incorporated country

total_holdings
number

total btc/eth holdings of company

total_entry_value_usd
number

total entry value in usd

total_current_value_usd
number

total current value of btc/eth holdings in usd

percentage_of_total_supply
number

percentage of total btc/eth supply

Updated about 1 month ago

üíº Global Market Cap Chart Data
Simple
Did this page help you?
Yes
No
LANGUAGE
Shell
Node
Ruby
PHP
Python
CREDENTIALS
Header
Log in to use your API keys
CURL REQUEST
1
curl --request GET \
2
     --url https://pro-api.coingecko.com/api/v3/companies/public_treasury/bitcoin \
3
     --header 'accept: application/json'
Try It!
RESPONSE
200
EXAMPLE
